text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Wow!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: This is the Christmas event at Haron Tower…! It's really exciting! And the decorations are terrible!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hey, there's a Snowdrift Wolf over there! Let's get a picture—

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Ah.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Isn't this the usual fight?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Maybe it's not the usual one?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: *sigh* I have to do something before Christmas. The two of you are the stars of this 'lighting ceremony'…
Time goes back several months.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Halong Tower… You all know it, right? It's a commercial facility and a popular symbol of the city.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: An annual Christmas event was held there, and an official ambassador was set up to liven things up.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: This year, you two will be chosen as official ambassadors… Vodka, Daiwa Scarlet…

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: We…! We…!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Official Ambassador!?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Official Ambassador… That's so cool! Ambassador… Ambassador Vodka! …Heheh♪

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Idiot, you're still in the middle of talking! Just listen quietly!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You'll be doing all sorts of work this time, but the most important thing is the lighting ceremony on Christmas Day.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: At night, the tower is illuminated with a limited design. Two lights that look like two Santas run up the tower in a spiral―

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: When we reach the top, Christmas lights shine in the sky. It's Santa's gift of light.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I spoke with the person who planned this design, but… I'm a passionate fan of yours.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: As her one and only rival, she wanted to liven up the event with a performance that matched her breathing.

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: My one and only… rival?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You two were the same age, in the same class, and even in the same room, but because your dispositions were completely different, there was no end to the fight.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: But once we run, we recognize each other as our one and only rivals, and compete with each other.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: There's something about the explosive power you two have when you stand side by side. I have high hopes for you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I-I appreciate the offer, but… I can't believe you're my one and only rival!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (Yeah, you're right. I'm the only one who can handle her.)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Th-That's right! Scarlet and I aren't like that!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I guess I'm the only one who can keep up with her.)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The two of them have chosen a pair. If you don't like it, we'll have to ask you to get off together.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: What?! No way, I wanna do it, Ambassador!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'm fine, too! You went through the trouble of choosing me!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Then, even if you can't accept it, swallow it. What should we do?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Geez, I can't help it. I really don't want to, but…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I don't like it either! But…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It looks like it's decided. The Student Council will be supporting you. I'll explain right away, but before that… Go get changed.

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Cool! So cute!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's still in the sample phase, but it doesn't look like there's anything to fix it. It looks good on you two.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: As I mentioned earlier, the other party has taken quite a liking to you. They were the ones who created the design beforehand.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wow! I'm really grateful. And Scarlet, you…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …What?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Not really…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Let's call the other members and continue explaining the event outline.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The Christmas decorations at Haron Tower have already begun. We will only be participating on the last day of Christmas.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: There are several plans to entertain the visitors until the light-up ceremony at night. It's the ambassador's job to participate and liven things up. There's also…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Hey. I don't remember you having such short hair.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You're so stupid! That's Laurel!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But you know, without any explanation, the three of you came out like, 'It's the Student Council.' It's possible Pres changed her image…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I'm the Student Council President, Sakura Laurel!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: What?!
